trigger.name: Backup Date is more than {$BACKUP_AGE_WARN} ago or unknown

step.params: var now = Math.round(Date.now() / 1000); return now - value;

item.name: System name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

trigger.name: SNMP unavailable
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

trigger.name: Virtual machine is powered off

discovery_rule.name: Discover VMware Datastores on Virtual Machine
discovery_rule.description: Discover VMware datastores used by the Virtual Machine

item_prototype.name: Datastore "{#VSPHERE.VM.DATASTORE.NAME}" is used by Virtual Machine

discovery_rule.name: Filesystem Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of filesystems on a VMware Virtual Machine

trigger_prototype.name: Less than 20% of free space on {#VSPHERE.VM.DISKPATH} at {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: ({Template App VFZ Sync:vfzsync.sync.status[fnt-zabbix].iregexp(completed,{$VFZ_SYNC_THRESHOLD})}=0) or ({Template App VFZ Sync:vfzsync.sync.status.date[fnt-zabbix].now()} - {Template App VFZ Sync:vfzsync.sync.status.date[fnt-zabbix].last()} > {$VFZ_SYNC_THRESHOLD})
trigger.name: VFZ Sync (fnt-zabbix) not completed in last {$VFZ_SYNC_THRESHOLD}

trigger.expression: ({Template App VFZ Sync:vfzsync.sync.status[vpoller-fnt].iregexp(completed,{$VFZ_SYNC_THRESHOLD})}=0) or (({Template App VFZ Sync:vfzsync.sync.status.date[vpoller-fnt].now()} - {Template App VFZ Sync:vfzsync.sync.status.date[vpoller-fnt].last()}) > {$VFZ_SYNC_THRESHOLD})
trigger.name: VFZ Sync (vpoller-fnt) not completed in last {$VFZ_SYNC_THRESHOLD}
